name: Smylies Accommodation
description:
Our home, your home.

37 years of sharing our property to people from all over the world.  Springfield, Smylies Stay is one of Springfield's oldest homes starting its history back in the 1870s as a guesthouse for the Bullock trains passing through. Set on just over one acre of grounds it offers plenty of space for rest and enjoyment and been extensively renovated with all modern backpacking facilities.choose from ensuites,motel units ,your own Cottage or a shared Hostel  room 

Our popular on-site Japanese restaurant is a hit with guests, please make sure you book just in case Keiko is having time off. We have an extensive English and Japanese library, plus DVDs available for the days you'd rather stay in.

Skiers love the ski tune up room and drying room, and we can arrange transfers to nearby fields. Our team can advise on where to go bouldering around Castle Hill, have climbing mats for rental and even a mini climbing wall to practice on!

groupInformation.terms:
Cancellations:
Cancellations made within 1 week of arrival / travel will result in the client being charged for the full amount.
·            Client no shows will be charged in full.
·            A non-refundable deposit of 20% of the total cost of travel is required to confirm a booking and cover administration and accommodation bookings

·            Changes of up to a 10% decrease in numbers of the original size can be made without penalty providing Smylies is notified a minimum of 1 week prior to arrival / travel for half day tours and activities and 2 weeks for for sole use trips during the Chinese New Year period, Japan golden week, NZ school holidays and NCEA periods.

 Any request to increase group size will be accommodated subject to availability and the group will be charged accordingly.

 

PAYMENT 

For NZ Schools and Institutions:
We will invoice you after the trip is finished and require full payment within 7 days of the invoice date into our bank account.
For new clients based in NZ and overseas:
We require 20% deposit on confirming the booking and full payment no more than 1 week prior to the trip commencing.

houseRules.notes:
We require you pay a deposit upon booking and the rest will be paid upon arrival unless it is a non refundable booking or a special event is on.

Double and twin rooms sleep two people but may be booked for one person only. However, in this situation you will have to pay the full room rate.
Prices are quoted in New Zealand dollars, are subject to change without notice, and all guests are required to pay the overnight price current at the time of reservation.
We will send you a booking confirmation and follow up communications related to your stay to the email address you provided us at the time of booking.

Should your plans change, please contact either the Booking engine you used to book thru or the hostel directly as soon as possible.
Whilst we will do our best to ensure you are accommodated in the same room throughout your stay, due to limited availability at time of booking, it may be necessary for you to change rooms. If applicable, you will be advised of this at check-in. You will be accommodated in a room of similar or higher standard to that originally booked.

Due to limited availability at time of booking, we may provide multi-share accommodation for two or more guests in separate rooms. We will do our best to ensure this does not occur, however should this be necessary we will advise you at check-in.
During special events, additional terms and conditions may apply. Our cancellation policy is also subject to change during these times.

Amendment, non-arrival, cancellation and refund charges:
Amendment
Regardless of when you booked, any amendments to your date of arrival cannot be made on the day you are due to arrive. This will instead be treated as a same day cancellation, meaning no refund.
 
Non-arrival: If you do not advise us that you are cancelling, there is no refund for the first night booked.
Smylies does not accept liability for your booking should you make an error in the selection of your booking dates and the above non-arrival condition will apply.

Cancellations: 
Bookings made on the day of arrival are non-refundable for the first night if you cancel. 
Where you cancel a pre-paid booking, we will:
Give you a refund if you cancel before 10am (local time)  on the day before arrival.
Not refund you for the first night if you cancel after 10am (local time)  on the day before arrival. However, we will fully refund you for subsequent nights.

If you do not advise us of your cancellation, the non-arrival clause applies.
CANCEL OR CHANGE A BOOKING
Refunds for cancelled bookings can be redeemed either by:
transferring the booking to an advance reservation if available but not in the same week as the booking  or being credited back to the original card debited.
